name: Space Force Warrior
description:
A game I made in a couple of weeks for LOWREZJAM 2020. Available in Finnish and English because I wanted to make a translation system I guess.

NOTE: Please read the controls below as they are not listed anywhere else.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
F - Toggle jetpack
Q + E - Move up and down with jetpack
Left click - Fire weapon
Right click - Change to weapon secondary mode
